page.title: 14Emergency Services in Chard
page.content: The area is covered by the Chard section of Foxtrot Division of{Avon} {and Somerset Police Authority.}The section is based on Chard Police Station and our block is covered by a{Sergeant}and a{PC.} There is not much{crime}here. In the villages there are about 20 incidents a year,mostly thefts of farm equipment like chain saws and electric fence power packs and petty thefts from Churches by tramps. There is some house breaking in the {dormitory villages}where many houses are left empty while their owners are at work. There is always at least one Policeman on duty in the Chard section and they keep in touch using portable radios. After 7.00pm control is switched to divisional HQ.at{Yeovil}where there are WPCs, dog handlers and cells.
